Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its unique features and high-quality craftsmanship, I believe it would greatly benefit you. I am extending this exclusive opportunity to purchase the product for $10000. This price reflects not only the value of the product itself but also the time, effort, and resources invested into its creation. I look forward to hearing your response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $10,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $10,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $8,000
